title: Fast Track: Clarity Release Connection
description: WHAT IS FAST TRACK? This book is a step-by-step manual not to teach you how to be a follower but to teach you how to be a leader, a conscious creator, be self-empowered and knowledgeable in how to achieve your desires yourself. Many have requested the how to in an easy format and this is what FAST TRACK brings you. You will find basic clear explanations and an easy outline to follow. This manual will assist you in your daily life as a reminder. Thank you for allowing me to serve you in this way by providing Clarity, Release and Connection.
author: Marilyn Holzmann
